name: "Balance" Notecards
description:
These notecards feature quilt blocks from Yvonne Malone's quilt, "Balance," which takes its inspiration from the colors and symbols of the Chakra. Printed on premium white paper stock, these flat cards also include an action to take to help open each Chakra; this phrase is printed in small type on the back of each card.
 
Each set includes 21 notecards and 21 envelopes (3 each of 7 designs).

name: "Balance" Quilt Pattern
description:
"Balance" takes its inspiration from the colors and symbols of the Chakra. Add interest to any room with this contemporary quilt design. 

The pattern includes directions for a twin/generous napping size quilt (Approx. 64-1/2" x 92-1/2") and a wall hanging (Approx. 12-1/2" x 87-1/2").  

Suitable for experienced beginners, detailed directions walk you through making your own "Balance" quilt!

name: ABC Squares Pattern
description:
ABC Squares is the perfect project for the beginning quilter, as well as the experienced. It can be stitched up to use as a wall hanging or napping quilt. Each square in the sample pictured represents one letter of the alphabet. 

This design works equally well for simply showcasing a collection of favorite fabrics.

A kit that includes both the pattern and fabrics are also available - just click on the Kits Category.

Finished size:  52" x 61"

name: Avenue Pattern
description:
Avenue is the first in an ongoing series of quilt designs that are small enough to take with you to work on in the car, on an airplane, or wherever else your busy life takes you. Whether you are an experienced quilter in search of a small project that can be completed in between larger ones or someone looking for a first project, Avenue goes together in several simple steps.

This quilt is great for using small scale graphic prints or more traditional fabrics such as feedsack reproductions.

A kit that includes both the pattern and fabrics are also available - just click on the Kits Category.

Finished size:  9" x 11-1/2"

name: ABC Squares Quilt Kit
description:
This quilt kit is perfect for the beginning quilter as well as the experienced. 

Finished size:  52" x 61"

The kit includes:

ABC Squares Pattern

26 novelty fabrics representing each letter of the alphabet (fabrics are preshrunk and cut to size) - please note, novelty fabrics may vary from kit to kit

Blue background fabric and green "frame" fabrics

Backing in contrasting fabric

Binding fabric

name: Avenue Quilt Kit - Trees
description:
This quilt pattern/kit is perfect for the beginning quilter or the experienced. Its small format makes it an easy project to take along wherever you go. The sample is machine pieced and hand quilted, but it is a great size for experimenting with hand piecing or machine quilting.  

Finished size:  9" x 11-1/2"

This kit includes:

Avenue pattern

Fabrics for quilt front

Fabric for quilt back

Cotton batting

name: Avenue Quilt Kit - Modern Baby
description:
This quilt pattern/kit is perfect for the beginning quilter or the experienced. Its small format makes it an easy project to take along wherever you go. The sample is machine pieced and hand quilted, but it is a great size for experimenting with hand piecing or machine quilting.  

Finished size:  9" x 11-1/2"

This kit includes:

Avenue pattern

Fabrics for quilt front

Fabric for quilt back

Cotton batting

name: Marcia Derse Fat Quarter Bundles
description:
A collection of eight fat quarters (18" x 22" each) from talented contemporary fabric designer Marcia Derse. 

Marcia Derse Fat Quarters Collection (8 fat quarters):  $22.00


All fabric sales are final.

name: Marcia Derse Fabric by the 1/2 Yard - Dark Blue/Light Blue Swirls
description:
This fabric is from textile designer Marcia Derse's Stream Line collection and is available for purchase here by the half yard. For example, if you want 1/2 yard, select a quantity of 1; if you want 2-1/2 yards, select a quantity of 5. 

Marcia uses a rich palette of colors, including pumpkin, terra cotta, red, magenta, purple, moss green, and persimmon to design fabrics based on her hand-dyed originals. In her original fabrics, there is a slight color variation to each one resulting in a rich look and making each piece unique. This same variation has been reproduced here so that even though the fabrics are produced by the hundreds of yards, rather than in quantities of less than a yard, they truly have retained the look of the original hand-dyed pieces.

This fabric is priced at $5.50 per 1/2 yard.

All fabric sales are final.

name: Fabric Tiles Table Runner Kit
description:
This table runner (or wall hanging) is made from Marcia Derse's fabrics using a free pattern available on my blog, PlayingWithFabric.wordpress.com - just click on Free Patterns and select Fabric Tiles Table Runner.

Finished size:  Approx. 49" x 13"

The kit includes:
Seven 7" x 7" squares from Marcia Derse fabrics
Fabric for background and table runner back

The sample is not quilted, however, if you choose to quilt it, this is a fairly portable project. Its dimensions also make it easy to quilt on a home sewing machine (especially compared to a bed quilt).  

Kit Price:  $20.00
